name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
[When Beijing becomes Sanhe]
On July 1, a Weibo blogger released a live interview record of the Beijing Majuqiao labor market, in which a migrant worker talked about the difficulties faced by migrant workers today.
A large number of migrant workers gathered near Beijing Majuqiao to find job opportunities. Now there are "too many people and too few jobs". A 12-hour loading and unloading day only earns 160 yuan, but there are still endless applicants, "just pay and go". It is difficult to find a job for those over 40 years old. Many people can't even afford a 20-yuan bunk bed a night, so they sleep in the streets and parks, causing the price of beds to fall.

The latest situation about Shanhe University
Netizens spontaneously formed a school committee, formulated the "Shanhe University Democratic Management Regulations", established various colleges and departments, and even some people acted as "tutors" to start teaching
A large-scale COSPLAY against the unfair distribution of educational resources is kicking off

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution: 
[A student from Renmin University of China stole the data of all students in the school to establish a beauty scoring system, and now works in the Tencent WeChat team]
On the evening of July 1, it was reported that Ma, a 2019 master's graduate from the Gaoling School of Artificial Intelligence of Renmin University of China, stole the school's intranet data while in school, collected personal information of [all undergraduate, master and doctoral students in the school] (including: photos, names, student numbers, native places, birthdays, etc.), and publicly posted it on the website for [beauty scoring] (the website has been urgently closed by him and the URL cannot be provided). 
It is reported that this person has won the National Award, the Three Good Students and successfully guaranteed admission to graduate school at school. He now works in the [Tencent Beijing WeChat Search Algorithm Team] In 2020, Ma once posted relevant content about the scoring website on Weibo, "Today, I and like-minded people have completed this bad thing that I wanted to do since my sophomore year. I wanted to post it on WeChat Moments, but there were too many people and eyes, so I was afraid of being punched, so I posted it on Weibo."
On July 1, 2023, he blew up the incident himself, and the Renmin University campus platform group quickly fermented and rushed to Weibo hot searches.

In the early morning of July 2, Kaifeng, Henan
Depositors of Henan Village Bank protested again to demand their deposits
It is reported that the current deposits of these depositors' UnionPay cards have been illegally frozen for 15 months.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ

Netizen contribution
On July 1, a fire broke out in a factory in Hangji Town, Yangzhou, Jiangsu Province
It is reported that this factory is called Wuai, which was famous for making hotel supplies in the past, but later closed down. Now the factory area is basically rented out as a warehouse or small workshop. The fire this time is suspected to be caused by slippers, linens and other things being ignited, and the fire-fighting facilities are not in place.
